operations.name: CustomerLimitQuery
Recommendations
Refinements
RefinementsBP
operations.body:
query RefinementsBP($standardLocale: StandardLocale, $country: StandardCountry) {
  refinements(standardLocale: $standardLocale, country: $country) {
    key
    value
    categoryId
    orderId
    refinements {
      key
      value
      items {
        key
        value
        visableInBP
        filterable
        image
        orderId
        avatarImageUrl
        description
        __typename
      }
      isBISignUp
      isBVQuestion
      largeDisplayType
      orderId
      selectionType
      showSkip
      smallDisplayType
      syncedWorlds
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
